p: The mapping assembly of the viral genome was almost complete for all samples. The genome coverage and the average read depth across the genome was 100.0 % and 133.5x for sample SRR10903401, 100.0 % and 522.5x for sample SRR10903402, and 99.9 %, and 598.2x for sample SRR10971381, respectively ( Table 1 ).
